mapper.update: update team_check set updateTime = now() where id = #{teamCheckId}
update team_check set province = #{province}, city = #{city}, district = #{district}, street = #{street}, streetNumber = #{streetNumber} where id = #{teamCheckId}
mapper.insert: insert into team_check(status, teamId, createTime, longitude, latitude) Value(0, #{teamId}, now(), #{longitude}, #{latitude})
